events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a minor collision yesterday evening near downtown.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the details submitted about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the case and will be reaching out for further information.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and begun processing it.
The agent has requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report.
All requested documents, including the police accident report and vehicle repair estimates, have been submitted.
The investigation into the circumstances of the car collision has officially commenced as part of the claim process.
The investigation is complete and the findings have been reviewed for the purpose of deciding the claim settlement.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the extent of vehicle damage and repair costs assessed.
The customer has provided positive feedback on the proposed settlement offer and the handling of the claim so far.
The claim has been formally approved and the insurance company is preparing to issue payment.
The settlement payment has been issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repairs and related costs.
The claim has been officially closed following receipt of payment and confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and records have been archived securely for future reference if necessary.
